# 为业务量身打造——阿里文娱用户及内容运营平台技术实践

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/wei-yewuliang-shen-dazao-ali-wenyu-yonghu-ji-neirong-yunying-pingtai-jishu-shijian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/wei-yewuliang-shen-dazao-ali-wenyu-yonghu-ji-neirong-yunying-pingtai-jishu-shijian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install wei-yewuliang-shen-dazao-ali-wenyu-yonghu-ji-neirong-yunying-pingtai-jishu-shijian
wei-yewuliang-shen-dazao-ali-wenyu-yonghu-ji-neirong-yunying-pingtai-jishu-shijian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g wei-yewuliang-shen-dazao-ali-wenyu-yonghu-ji-neirong-yunying-pingtai-jishu-shijian
wei-yewuliang-shen-dazao-ali-wenyu-yonghu-ji-neirong-yunying-pingtai-jishu-shijian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
